testsuite.name: com.tim.one.validator.UserSaveCommandValidatorIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: When we need to create an user with name josdem and josdem@josdem.mx as email when we validate we expecting that result is true
When we need to create an user with name and josdem@josdem.mx as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
When we need to create an user with name null and josdem@josdem.mx as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
When we need to create an user with name josdem and as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
When we need to create an user with name josdem and null as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
When we need to create an user with name josdem and josdem as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
When we need to create an user with name <script>alert('hello josdem')</script> and josdem as email when we validate we expecting that result is false
